title: Bentham - purpose of the first paragraph

content.question: One purpose of the first paragraph is to

choices.label: suggest that beauty is not an essential element of good art
discount the importance of imaginative thinking
distinguish between two types of imagination
reinforce popular views of creative imagination

content.answer: distinguish between two types of imagination

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
